segments.text: Michael , it is time to wake up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is time to wake up . And , also , from now on I will speak only English to you . And you should speak only English to me , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be hard at first , but I think I can do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know you can do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is great . All I want is for you to do your best in everything you do .
segments.speaker: S1
